thread.title: Sotomayor officiates at same-sex wedding in Washington
thread.title_full: Sotomayor officiates at same-sex wedding in Washington - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Sotomayor officiates at same-sex wedding in Washington
text:
WASHINGTON (AP) - Justice Sonia Sotomayor has presided over the same-sex wedding of the owners of a Washington consulting firm that focuses on Hispanic and gay rights issues.
Ingrid Duran and Catherine Pino are the founders of the consulting firm D&P Creative Strategies. Supreme Court spokeswoman Kathleen Arberg said Sotomayor officiated at their wedding Saturday in Washington.
Arberg said the justice is a friend of the couple.
It was Sotomayor's first time presiding at such a wedding. She joins colleagues Ruth Bader Ginsburg and Elena Kagan, as well as retired Justice Sandra Day O'Connor, in conducting same-sex weddings.
The three sitting justices were part of the majority decision in June that extended same-sex marriage nationwide.
Sotomayor's participation in the wedding ceremony was first reported by the Washington Blade.
